about_the_game:
The Forgotten But Unbroken soundtrack includes 27 tracks from the game.

About the Composer

Matúš Jacko(MattJack) born in march 1991 in the city of Michalovce on the eastern side of Slovakia.

First hints that he aspired towards the music came when he was 3 years old.
He was making drums out of pots and started imitating musicians he saw on television. 
His mom gave him his first keyboard on his fifth birthday. In a matter of few days, it was obvious that he can play melodies intuitively. Few years later came first attempts at forming a band with his friends.

In the year 2010 he joined a Christian band, where he also contributed with lyrics and songs until 2016. From this moment he devoted himself to studio music and to musical corrections for other musicians from Slovak and Czech Republic.Until 2019 movie/game music were only his hobby, until he got in touch with a leader of Centurion Developments(NEUTRAWORKS) and started working on the game Forgotten but Unbroken.His greatest musical influences were games (Battlefield 1, Mafia 1-2, Warcraft series, ANNO series, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt), and films (Star Wars, Cave of the Golden Rose, Hans Zimmer, and the symphonic band Nightwish.

The Forgotten But Unbroken soundtrack includes 27 tracks from the game.

About the Composer

Matúš Jacko(MattJack) born in march 1991 in the city of Michalovce on the eastern side of Slovakia.

First hints that he aspired towards the music came when he was 3 years old.
He was making drums out of pots and started imitating musicians he saw on television. 
His mom gave him his first keyboard on his fifth birthday. In a matter of few days, it was obvious that he can play melodies intuitively. Few years later came first attempts at forming a band with his friends.

In the year 2010 he joined a Christian band, where he also contributed with lyrics and songs until 2016. From this moment he devoted himself to studio music and to musical corrections for other musicians from Slovak and Czech Republic.Until 2019 movie/game music were only his hobby, until he got in touch with a leader of Centurion Developments(NEUTRAWORKS) and started working on the game Forgotten but Unbroken.His greatest musical influences were games (Battlefield 1, Mafia 1-2, Warcraft series, ANNO series, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt), and films (Star Wars, Cave of the Golden Rose, Hans Zimmer, and the symphonic band Nightwish.
name: Forgotten but Unbroken Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 820 MB available space

short_description: Over 1 hour of music from the game Forgotten But Unbroken.
